item.title: The Cheaper T1 Line is a T1 Line
item.description: Your telecommunications setup is vital to your business. While your current T1 lines for phone and internet are reliable, you’re searching for budget cuts. However, before you think about drastically reducing your telecom expenses, consider these points: Switching to cheaper, consumer-grade internet and phone services will likely result in lower performance and reliability. This could mean dropped calls, outages, and a negative impact on your clients and suppliers. You don’t need to downgrade your service to save money.
